metadata.author: Product Head
metadata.description: Complete feature list for Patient Detail Page with 4 tabs (Overview, Medications, Outreach, Med Adherence)

changes: Removed Tab 5: Refill Worklist (F-PD-055 to F-PD-065)
Updated tab navigation from 5 tabs to 4 tabs
Added Medication Timeline Drawer features (F-PD-096 to F-PD-121)
Updated total feature count from 95 to 121

features.name: Display patient name
features.description: Show patient full name (Last, First format) in header
acceptance_criteria: Font is large and readable (text-2xl or larger)
Name is visible immediately on page load

features.name: Display patient DOB and age
features.description: Show date of birth with calculated age

features.name: Display contact information
features.description: Show phone, email, and address

features.name: Display member ID
features.description: Show insurance member ID prominently
acceptance_criteria: Member ID visible in header area

features.name: Display insurance information
features.description: Show plan name, group number, effective dates

features.name: Display primary pharmacy
features.description: Show pharmacy name, location, phone

features.name: Display current PDC
features.description: Show PDC percentage with color-coded badge

features.name: Display gap days summary
features.description: Show gap days used, allowed, remaining
acceptance_criteria: Gap Days Remaining displayed with color indicator

features.name: Display fragility tier badge
features.description: Show fragility tier (COMP/F1-F5/T5) with color
acceptance_criteria: Tier badge shows COMP, F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, or T5
Color coding: F1=red, F2=orange, F3=amber, F4=blue, F5=green, T5=gray, COMP=green

features.name: Display delay budget
features.description: Show delay budget calculation (Gap Days Remaining ÷ Refills Remaining)
acceptance_criteria: Delay budget displayed in days/refill format
Formula shown: Gap Days Remaining ÷ Refills Remaining
CRITICAL: This is used for tier assignment, NOT raw gap days

features.name: Display priority score
features.description: Show priority score with bonus breakdown
acceptance_criteria: Bonuses listed: Out of Meds (+30), Q4 (+25), Multiple MA (+15), New Patient (+10)

features.name: Display MA measure badges
features.description: Show MAC/MAD/MAH badges with status
acceptance_criteria: MAC badge if patient on statin
MAD badge if patient on diabetes medication
MAH badge if patient on hypertension medication

features.name: Display upcoming actions/alerts
features.description: Show refills due, appointments, follow-ups

features.name: Collapsible sections
features.description: Allow expanding/collapsing each section

features.name: Care team notes section
features.description: Display and add care team notes

features.name: Display medication table
features.description: Show all medications in sortable table

features.name: Medication name column
features.description: Display medication name with dosage

features.name: Medication class column
features.description: Display drug class with color-coded badge
acceptance_criteria: Color coding: Statins=purple, ACE/ARBs=blue, Biguanides=teal, etc.
Hover shows full class name if truncated

features.name: PDC column
features.description: Display per-medication PDC with color indicator

features.name: Days remaining column
features.description: Display days until runout with urgency indicator
acceptance_criteria: Negative values show 'OUT' badge in red
Color: <=0 red, 1-3 red, 4-7 orange, 8-14 amber, >14 green

features.name: Last fill date column
features.description: Display date of most recent fill

features.name: Refills remaining column
features.description: Display remaining refills on prescription

features.name: MA badge indicator
features.description: Display badge if medication is MA-tracked

features.name: Status filter
features.description: Filter medications by status
acceptance_criteria: Filter options: All, Active, Inactive, Due Soon
Count shown next to each filter option

features.name: Column sorting
features.description: Sort by any column ascending/descending

features.name: Medication row click opens Timeline Drawer
features.description: Click row to open Medication Timeline Drawer
acceptance_criteria: Drawer shows Details, Timeline, and Claims tabs

features.name: Empty state message
features.description: Display message when no medications found

features.name: Days since last contact display
features.description: Show days since last patient contact
acceptance_criteria: Color coding: >30 days = red, 14-30 = amber, <14 = green

features.name: Outreach history timeline
features.description: Display chronological list of all contacts
acceptance_criteria: Each entry shows: date, type, outcome, staff

features.name: Filter by contact type
features.description: Filter outreach by Phone/Email/SMS/Video

features.name: Filter by outcome
features.description: Filter by Reached/Not Reached/Voicemail/etc.
acceptance_criteria: Options: All, Reached, Not Reached, Left Voicemail, Wrong Number

features.name: Filter by time range
features.description: Filter by 7/30/90 days or all time
acceptance_criteria: Clear visual indication of selected range

features.name: Communication preferences display
features.description: Show patient's preferred contact method/time

features.name: Log New Call button
features.description: Button to open call logging modal
acceptance_criteria: Opens AI Call Log Modal on click

features.name: AI Call Log Modal
features.description: Modal for documenting calls with AI assistance
acceptance_criteria: Fields: outcome, notes, follow-up date, follow-up action

features.name: Call outcome selection
features.description: Select call outcome from predefined list
acceptance_criteria: Dropdown with outcomes: Reached - Agreed, Reached - Declined, Left Voicemail, No Answer, Wrong Number

features.name: Call notes field
features.description: Free-text field for call notes

features.name: Next action scheduling
features.description: Set follow-up date and action from call log
acceptance_criteria: Action dropdown: Call back, Email, Send SMS, Schedule visit

features.name: Contact success rate
features.description: Display calculated success rate percentage

features.name: AI Call Prep Banner
features.description: Display AI-generated talking points before call
acceptance_criteria: Banner appears at top of Outreach tab
Shows: patient context, medications due, suggested talking points

features.name: Current PDC display with status badge
features.description: Show large PDC percentage with PASSING/AT-RISK/FAILING badge

features.name: Gap days breakdown card
features.description: Show gap days used, allowed, remaining in card
acceptance_criteria: Gap Days Used = Treatment Period - Covered Days
Gap Days Remaining = Allowed - Used (can be negative)

features.name: Days to year end display
features.description: Show countdown to December 31

features.name: Fragility tier card with contact window
features.description: Show tier and recommended contact window
acceptance_criteria: Contact window shown: F1=24hrs, F2=48hrs, F3=1wk, F4=2wks, F5=Monthly

features.name: Delay budget display
features.description: Show delay budget calculation with formula
acceptance_criteria: Delay Budget = Gap Days Remaining ÷ Remaining Refills
CRITICAL: This determines tier, not raw gap days

features.name: Priority score card with bonuses
features.description: Show priority score with breakdown of bonuses
acceptance_criteria: Base score from tier (F1=100, F2=80, F3=60, F4=40, F5=20)
Bonuses listed: Out of Meds (+30), Q4 (+25), Multiple MA (+15), New Patient (+10)

features.name: PDC Status Quo projection
features.description: Show projected PDC if no more refills
acceptance_criteria: Formula: (Covered Days + min(Current Supply, Days to Year End)) ÷ Treatment Period
Shows interpretation: 'Will reach 80%' or 'Will fall short'

features.name: PDC Perfect projection
features.description: Show projected PDC if perfect adherence from now
acceptance_criteria: Formula: (Covered Days + Days to Year End) ÷ Treatment Period

features.name: T5 (Lost) status indicator
features.description: Show special indicator when PDC Perfect < 80%
acceptance_criteria: T5 badge displayed when PDC Perfect < 80%
Message: 'Patient cannot reach 80% compliance this year'

features.name: MA medications table
features.description: Display table of MA-tracked medications with per-med metrics
acceptance_criteria: Columns: Medication, Measure, PDC, Gap Days, Days to Runout

features.name: Treatment period display
features.description: Show treatment period (first fill to Dec 31)
acceptance_criteria: Total days in treatment period calculated

features.name: Covered days display
features.description: Show total days with medication coverage
acceptance_criteria: Shows as 'X of Y days covered'

features.name: Refills needed calculation
features.description: Calculate and display refills needed to reach 80%
acceptance_criteria: Calculation based on gap days remaining
Shows 'N/A' if already compliant or T5

features.name: COMPLIANT check before tier assignment
features.description: Always check PDC Status Quo >= 80% before assigning F1-F5
acceptance_criteria: CRITICAL RULE: If PDC Status Quo >= 80%, tier = COMPLIANT
Only assign F1-F5 if PDC Status Quo < 80%
This check happens BEFORE delay budget calculation

features.name: Open Medication Timeline Drawer from table
features.description: Click medication row in MA table to open Timeline Drawer
acceptance_criteria: Opens Medication Timeline Drawer on click
Drawer shows full medication details, timeline, and claims

features.name: Drawer slide-out animation
features.description: Drawer slides in from right side of screen
acceptance_criteria: Click outside or X button to close

features.name: Drawer header with medication name
features.description: Show medication name and key badges in drawer header

features.name: Three-tab navigation (Details/Timeline/Claims)
features.description: Tab bar with Details, Timeline, and Claims tabs
acceptance_criteria: Active tab visually distinct (Clinical Calm blue #4A90A4)

features.name: Key metrics summary row
features.description: Display PDC, Gap Days, Days Supply at top of Details tab
acceptance_criteria: Days Supply Remaining with urgency color

features.name: Medication information section
features.description: Display drug name, class, dosage, strength, NDC

features.name: Prescriber information section
features.description: Display prescriber name, NPI, phone, specialty

features.name: Pharmacy information section
features.description: Display pharmacy name, address, phone

features.name: Last fill information
features.description: Display last fill date, quantity, days supply
acceptance_criteria: Last fill date in MM/DD/YYYY format

features.name: Refills remaining with renewal indicator
features.description: Display refills remaining and prescription status

features.name: Visual timeline with event dots
features.description: Horizontal timeline visualization showing fill events, gaps, due dates
acceptance_criteria: Timeline spans treatment period (first fill to Dec 31)
Events displayed as colored dots on timeline

features.name: Fill events (green dots)
features.description: Display prescription fill events as green dots
acceptance_criteria: Hover shows: fill date, quantity, days supply, pharmacy
Click expands to full detail card

features.name: Gap events (red dots/spans)
features.description: Display medication gap periods as red markers
acceptance_criteria: Hover shows: gap start, gap end, days without medication
Highlighted in timeline as red zone

features.name: Due date marker (blue dot)
features.description: Display projected refill due date
acceptance_criteria: Blue dot for refill due date
Positioned based on days supply from last fill
Past due shown with warning indicator

features.name: Reversal markers (strikethrough)
features.description: Display reversed/cancelled fills distinctly
acceptance_criteria: Reversal date shown if different from fill date

features.name: Timeline legend
features.description: Display color legend for timeline events
acceptance_criteria: Legend shows: Green=Fill, Red=Gap, Blue=Due, Gray=Reversed
Interactive: clicking legend item highlights events

features.name: Event detail cards
features.description: Expandable detail cards for each timeline event
acceptance_criteria: Click event to expand detail card
Card shows: full date, quantity, pharmacy, claim ID
Only one card expanded at a time
Click outside or card to collapse

features.name: Timeline date range filter
features.description: Filter timeline to specific date range
acceptance_criteria: Presets: Last 90 days, Last 6 months, YTD, All time

features.name: RX claims table
features.description: Display table of all prescription claims
acceptance_criteria: Columns: Fill Date, NDC, Days Supply, Pharmacy, Status
Shows: Paid, Reversed, Pending status with badges

features.name: Claim status badges
features.description: Display claim status with color-coded badges
acceptance_criteria: REVERSED = Red badge with strikethrough row

features.name: Claim detail expansion
features.description: Click claim row to expand full details
acceptance_criteria: Expansion shows: Claim ID, Quantity, Cost, Plan Paid, Patient Paid

features.name: Claims pagination
features.description: Paginate claims table for many records

features.name: Claims empty state
features.description: Display message when no claims found
acceptance_criteria: Message: 'No claims found for this medication'
Helpful context about what this means

features.name: Back to list button
features.description: Button to navigate back to All Patients
acceptance_criteria: Preserves any filters/search from previous view

features.name: PDC badge in header
features.description: Display PDC badge prominently in page header

features.name: Fragility tier in header
features.description: Display fragility tier badge in header

features.name: Tab navigation component
features.description: 4-tab navigation bar
acceptance_criteria: Tabs: Overview, Medications, Outreach, Med Adherence

features.name: Tab badge counts
features.description: Show counts on tabs where relevant
acceptance_criteria: Outreach shows days since last contact

features.name: Tab persistence
features.description: Remember last active tab during session
acceptance_criteria: Direct link to specific tab works

features.name: Page load under 2 seconds
features.description: Full page renders in under 2 seconds
acceptance_criteria: Time from click to full render < 2s

features.name: Tab switch under 500ms
features.description: Switching tabs completes in under 500ms
acceptance_criteria: No visible loading state for cached tabs

features.name: Lazy loading for heavy content
features.description: Heavy content loads on demand
acceptance_criteria: RX claims loaded when Claims tab opened in drawer
Timeline events loaded when drawer opened

features.name: Keyboard navigation
features.description: Full keyboard navigation support

features.name: Screen reader support
features.description: Content accessible to screen readers
acceptance_criteria: Focus management in modals and drawers

features.name: Color contrast compliance
features.description: All text meets WCAG 2.1 AA contrast
acceptance_criteria: Color not sole indicator of state

features.name: Loading state display
features.description: Show loading indicator while data loads
acceptance_criteria: Spinner or skeleton shown during load
Timeout after 10 seconds with retry option

features.name: Error state display
features.description: Show error message if data fails to load

features.name: Patient not found handling
features.description: Handle case when patient ID not found

features.name: Partial data handling
features.description: Gracefully handle missing data fields

features.name: PDC calculation accuracy
features.description: PDC matches Golden Standard formula

features.name: Gap days calculation accuracy
features.description: Gap days match Golden Standard formula
acceptance_criteria: Gap Days Used = Treatment Period - Covered Days

features.name: Delay budget calculation accuracy
features.description: Delay budget matches Golden Standard
acceptance_criteria: Delay Budget = Gap Days Remaining / Refills Remaining
NOT raw gap days for tiers

features.name: Fragility tier accuracy
features.description: Tier assignment uses fragilityTierService.js
acceptance_criteria: Tier based on delay budget thresholds

features.name: Priority score accuracy
features.description: Priority score matches Golden Standard

features.name: Drawer keyboard accessibility
features.description: Drawer supports full keyboard navigation
acceptance_criteria: Focus trapped inside drawer when open
Focus returns to trigger element on close

features.name: Drawer loading states
features.description: Show loading indicators while drawer data loads
acceptance_criteria: Skeleton shown while Timeline data loads
Skeleton shown while Claims data loads
Error state if data fails to load

features.name: Drawer responsive behavior
features.description: Drawer adapts to screen size

features.name: Timeline hover tooltips
features.description: Show tooltips on hover over timeline events

features.name: Timeline zoom controls
features.description: Allow zooming in/out on timeline

features.name: Claims search/filter
features.description: Search and filter claims
acceptance_criteria: Search by claim ID, pharmacy, NDC

features.name: Claims export
features.description: Export claims data

features.name: Deep link to drawer
features.description: URL parameter to open drawer directly
acceptance_criteria: Drawer opens on page load if param present

features.name: Open Timeline Drawer from MA summary cards
features.description: Click medication name in summary cards to open drawer

features.name: Timeline preview on hover
features.description: Show mini timeline preview on medication row hover
acceptance_criteria: Small timeline preview (last 90 days) on hover

features.name: Adherence summary in Details
features.description: Show adherence summary metrics in Details tab

features.name: Action buttons in Details
features.description: Quick action buttons in Details tab

features.name: Print/Share drawer content
features.description: Print or share drawer information

features.name: Coverage coverage visualization
features.description: Show coverage periods as colored bands

features.name: Projected coverage visualization
features.description: Show projected future coverage
acceptance_criteria: Dashed line from today to year end

features.name: Navigation between medications
features.description: Navigate to next/previous medication in drawer

features.name: Reversal reason display
features.description: Show reversal reason for reversed claims
acceptance_criteria: Common reasons: Duplicate, Patient Request, Insurance Change

features.name: Cost breakdown display
features.description: Show cost breakdown for each claim

features.name: Notes/comments section
features.description: Display and add notes about medication

features.name: Drawer scroll preservation
features.description: Preserve scroll position when switching tabs

features.name: Timeline event count summary
features.description: Show summary counts above timeline

features.name: Clinical Calm UI styling
features.description: Apply Clinical Calm design system to drawer
acceptance_criteria: Clean, minimal design reducing visual noise

features.name: Drawer animation preferences
features.description: Respect reduced motion preferences
acceptance_criteria: Disable slide animation if reduced motion preferred
